Sentencas: In this study the fabrication and characterization of Ni/10ScSZ (Ni/10 mol% Sc(2)O(3)-90 mol% ZrO(2)) and Ni/10Sc1CeSZ (Ni/10 mol% Sc(2)O(3)-1 mol% CeO(2)-89 mol% ZrO(2))
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: cermet anode films was studied and compared.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Both 10ScSZ and 10Sc1CeSZ electrolyte powders showed tetragonal and cubic phases at room temperature, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The NiO/10ScSZ and NiO/10Sc1CeSZ composites with 10-60 vol% of Ni content were prepared by mixing as-received commercial powders of NiO, 10ScSZ and 10Sc1CeSZ followed by ink preparation.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Samples were sintered for 1 h at temperatures of 1250-1350 degrees C. All the cermet films were then reduced under a mixture of hydrogen (10%) and nitrogen (90%) at 800 degrees C for 2 h. The effect of Ni content and sinter temperature on the DC electrical conductivity were investigated, and the results showed a sharp change in conductivity at around 30 vol% Ni, corresponding to continuity/discontinuity of the Ni Ni contact network, and the conductivity increased as the sinter temperature increased from 1250 to 1350 degrees C. An acceptable electrical conductivity at 700 degrees C for these cermet films was obtained at >40 vol% Ni, consistent with behaviour reported for more conventional Ni-YSZ cermets.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The effect of sinter temperature on the microstructure and porosity of Ni/10Sc1CeSZ and Ni/10ScSZ cermet films was also investigated.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: This revealed that the porosity of the cermet films with the same Ni content decreased as the sinter temperature increased and that, for a given sinter temperature, the porosity of the cermet films increased.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs
Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The porosities of 40Ni/60ScCeSZ (40 vol% Ni/60 vol% 10Sc1CeSZ) and 40Ni/60ScSZ (40 vol% Ni/60 vol% 10ScSZ) anodes sintered at 1250, 1300 and 1350 degrees C for 1 h were in the range of 30-45%.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Electrochemical measurement of symmetrical cells using an 8YSZ electrolyte at 700 degrees C revealed that the lowest electrode polarization resistance of 40Ni/60ScCeSZ and 40Ni/60ScSZ anodes was obtained at sinter temperatures of 1350 degrees C and 1300 degrees C respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Carbon deposition over 40Ni/60ScCeSZ, 40Ni/60ScSZ and 40Ni/60YSZ catalysts was evaluated at 700 degrees C for 1 h at S/C = 0.8 and the results showed that the ratio of deposited carbon was lower in the case of Ni/10ScSZ and Ni/10Sc1CeSZ compared to Ni/YSZ (0.35).
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Overall, Ni/10Sc1CeSZ and Ni/10ScSZ cermets having 40 vol% Ni were found to be optimum, with the 40Ni/60ScCeSZ cermet proving to be better than 40Ni/60ScSZ cermet in terms of both electronic conductivity and electrode polarization resistance, with both materials exhibiting improved tolerance towards carbon deposition compared to Ni/YSZ.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of Ni/ScSZ cermet anodes for IT-SOFCs
